title: Gingerbread garage
description: This customised gingerbread garage is the perfect Christmas gift for cake lovers and petrolheads alike.For this recipe, a large freestanding food mixer would be ideal. You will also need some cardboard to make templates for the garage shape and a piping bag.
ingredients: 2kg/4lb 8oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
selection of brightly coloured chocolate and jelly sweets
selection of milk and white chocolate buttons
2kg/4lb 8oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
selection of brightly coloured chocolate and jelly sweets
selection of milk and white chocolate buttons
